snippet.title: Earthbound Dimensions Intro - Mother Direct 2023 Trailer
snippet.description:
The Earthbound Dimensions trailer presented at the 2023 Mother Direct.

Earthbound Dimensions is a fangame made with Godot Engine that reimagines Earthbound/Mother 2 as a 3D game.

This is not only a trailer but the actual intro that plays when you boot the game up. It is actually rendered in real time in Godot, not FMV, and you can even slightly tilt the camera as the scene plays out.

This took so much more time to create than I thought it would that I'm actually surprised I got it done in time for the Mother Direct! I would like to thank Yuki Takahashi (aka karasudon) for her art direction help which took these scenes to the next level. You can see her portfolio in the links below.  Please enjoy!

-- Relevant links to learn more about the project and the studio --
Project website: https://ebdimensions.com
Project profile on Twitter: https://twitter.com/earthbound3d
Yuki Takahashi's portfolio on Behance: https://www.behance.net/MarciaYuki
My profile on Twitter: https://twitter.com/antourenein
My profile on Bandcamp: https://antourenein.bandcamp.com/ (You can check the Earthbound Dimensions Soundtrack over there)

Studio Allele website: studio-allele.com
